name: A Little Mixer Truck in Action Free: 3D Cartoonish Construction Driving Game for Kids
name_original: A Little Mixer Truck in Action Free: 3D Cartoonish Construction Driving Game for Kids
description:
People say: cities are jungle made by concrete. Our city life is full of construction sites, mixer trucks, truck drivers, closed roads, special construction vehicles, huge cargoes - all the best machines for construction. But one of the most colorful and interesting machines is the mixer truck - with it's mixer parts painted in different colors and spinning while on transport this truck gets the attention of the kids and became part of their games. These special construction trucks are different from others - they seems to be cute with all those nicely curved moving parts, It's natural, that a lot of kids invent games, where they want to be drivers of such a special mixer trucks.
We are mixer truck fans too, and we love 3D cartoon graphics. Not only because we've been kids before, but because we have kids now who love cartoons, games, who play on their imagined cities constructing known and unknown shaped buildings on their imagined construction sites. Even for them all of the construction work is just a game they really understand how important mixer truck are - they are the best vehicles supplying concrete to city development. And being drivers of those vehicles makes them dreams coming truth, let the kids imagination to fly freely.
This free driver game itself is made in a beautifully crafted 3D City environment with Cartoon graphics. Your mixer truck is modeled in 3D, in this game cartoon graphics show parts of the city, the construction sites.

Features
- Unique driving experience with alternate controls. Controls are switchable.
- Special challenges, as High Traffic, Crossroads, Moving Machinery, other obstacles...
- You can level up in 5 different areas to earn extra profits and proof your driving skills
- Beautifully crafted 3D Cartoon environment
- Different mixer trucks to drive with unique Settings for better driving experience
- Customizable gameplay with numerous upgrades
- Lots of different power-ups
